## Background

Elijah Corless is a driven business strategist and hybrid athlete with a passion for solving complex problems at the intersection of strategy, technology, and people. He is currently pursuing a B.S. in Business Management with a minor in Psychology at Brigham Young University’s Marriott School of Business.  

At BYU, Elijah serves as President of the Management Consulting Association, leading initiatives to prepare students for careers in management consulting. He combines his academic training with hands-on leadership, mentoring peers and coordinating events that bridge classroom learning with real-world strategy.  

Elijah brings a unique blend of **strategic rigor and entrepreneurial execution**. His professional experience spans top-tier consulting and international marketing, including Summer Business Analyst role at McKinsey & Company and International Marketing Analyst Intern with Melaleuca.
